paper_title.ja: 能動的自己評価(ASE)の累積による課題解決の自己判断力の変容
paper_title.en: Transformation of self-judgment ability for problem solving by accumulations of active self-evaluation: the 5th grade "Syosya" in elementary school

description.ja: 児童が自ら課題を見つけ,それを解決することを目標として学習に主体的に取り組んでいけるためには,自らの課題解決の進行状況をリアルタイムで自ら評価しながら,学習活動を進めていく自己判断力が求められる。本発表では,書写の授業におけるそのような自己判断力を高めるために,能動的自己評価を用いた授業実践から,児童の自己判断力の変容について報告する。 その結果,1目標達成(課題解決)に対する児童の自己判断の信頼性が向上する,2目標未達成(課題未解決)に対する児童の自己判断の信頼性の向上は1よりも困難である,3課題の解決・未解決に対する自己評価として,目標と一貫性のある自己判断力が高まることなどが有意に指摘できた。It is necessary to improve the self-evaluation ability of own problem solving for developing an independent problem-solving ability. It is actually influenced by the self-judgment ability about the self-evaluation. To improve the ability of self-judgment, Active Self-Evaluation Method(ASE)was proven to be effective by the early research. In this research, the effectiveness of the ASE to the improvement of the brush skill is examined through the learning of"Syosya"on the 5th grade in the elementary school. The following results were achieved by the accumulations of ASE for problem solving. (1) It is clarified that the reliability of the self-judgment for the problem solving is improved. (2) The transformation on the reliability of the self-judgment for an unsettled problem is not improved easily than for the solution of problem. (3) It is clarified that the transformation of self-judgment ability which has consistency with objectives of problem solving is improved.

paper_title.ja: 幼児の継続視聴の教育効果としての時系列認識の変容
A Study on the Transformation of the Consciousness of Order through the Accumulation of Watching TV Programs in Kindergarten Children
paper_title.en: A Study on the Transformation of the Consciousness of Order through the Accumulation of Watching TV Programs in Kindergarten Children

description.ja: 本研究は幼児を対象とする継続視聴の教育効果の検討として、映像認識の基盤としての時系列認識を取り上げた。継続視聴のし方から幼児を3群に分類し、NHK幼稚園・保育所向けテレビ放送番組「しぜんとあそぼ」から選んだ番組に対する(1)番組展開に対する時系列認識と、(2)生物の成長変化に対する時系列認識の2種の時系列認識を測定した。その結果、(1)番組展開の時系列認識については3群間で有意に異なること、継続視聴している幼児の方が時系列認識が有意に高いこと、継続視聴番組が異なっても時系列認識には差が認められないこと、また、(2)成長変化の時系列認識についても3群間で有意に異なり、継続視聴している方が有意に高いこと、継続視聴番組の違いにより時系列認識に番組特性が認められること等が指摘できた。これらの結果から継続視聴の教育効果を時系列認識の変容の観点で指摘することができた。
description.en: This study aims to make clear the effect of the accumulation of education through TV programs in kindergarten. Three subjects groups were selected according to the type of activities for watching TV. Two kinds of the consciousness of order were measured and compared among the subjects. One was about the story development of TV program and the other was about the growth of living thing in TV program, followed from watching TV program "Firefly" which was produced for infant education TV program as the series of "Play with Living Things (Sizen to asobo)". As the results, there were some significant differences about the consciousness of order among the subject groups. The consciousness of order about the story development from the accumulative subjects showed more accurate than from the no-accumulative subjects. The consciousness of order about the growth of living thing from the accumulative subjects showed more accurate than from the no-accumulative subjects. These results made clear the effect of the accumulation of education through TV programs in infant education.
